channel.title: Hi, Auke from Mexico City - upflow.io
channel.description:
Hi nice to meet you all! I`m Auke and together with a partner we're looking into creating a B2B Saas Product. Living in Mexico City but originally from The Netherlands.
We're currently still working on validating our idea. Our product is targeted at digital marketers working as freelancers/consultants for multiple clients.
Here for advice (to give and take) and to share ideas.
During the day I work as a consultant for multiple clients as conversion optimization specialist.
